title: List some Voice Actors who haven't voiced Champions yet, and need to do so in the future
body:
My picks:

**Michelle Ruff** (Rukia in Bleach, Sinon in Sword Art Online, Rita in Tales of Vesperia, Etna in Disgaea)

**Ronald Banks** (Quan Chi in Mortal Kombat X) (he'd make a kickass Singed)

**Clancy Brown** (Lex Luthor in various Superman cartoons)

Who are your picks?

replies.body: I keep writing letters to Nicolas Cage asking him to voice [Singed](http://i.imgur.com/V1bOi.jpg) but he must not-a got 'em there probably was a problem at the post office or something sometimes I scribble addresses too sloppy when I jot 'em.

Stefan Karl Stefànsson for{{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} 
EU SOU NUMERO UM!
James Earl Jones as {{champion:82}}

hasn't Cage not got the way of Lebouf??? He used to Hot shit but new he is......
That wasn't bad

I personally would go with Ronald Banks because of his epic Quan Chi voice.

https://youtu.be/I8UvFZssW_c
We have to have someone voiced by the famous **Tara Strong**, who's basically voiced all of Cartoon Network at some point.

Morgan Freeman: "Boop" "BWOOONG" "ting"

[Hmmm. That's hilarious.](https://youtu.be/kjK-LzkekCU?t=56s)
+1
Morgan Freeman announcer pack when?
Mark Hamill, for a new skin in the Chosen line.
I still cant beat ToV damned final boss is bs{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Troy Baker, who voiced Joel from The Last of Us and Erron Black in Mortal Kombat X, among a lot of other stuff

my picks

**Steve Blum** (Wolverine in pretty much any X-Men cartoon) - he'd make a great voice for Darius if we ever get an anime

**Peter Cullen** (Optimus Prime)

**Dan Green** (Entei, Atem from Yu-Gi-Oh!) - Garen could work

**Eric Stuart** (Brock from Pokémon and Seto Kaiba from Yu-Gi-Oh!)

I am going to go ahead and state the obvious Keith David needing to voice Galio.

**Roger L. Jackson** (Ghostface voice from Scream movies, Mojo Jojo from PPG, Cheshire Rabbit, Dormouse, and Jabberwocky from the Alice games)

I personally think his Ghostface voice would work well for Fiddlesticks.
